sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Table} from 'react-bootstrap'; import './PlayerProfile.css'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; class PlayerProfile extends Component { static propTypes={ auth:PropTypes.object.isRequired } render(){ const {isLoggedIn, user} = this.props.auth; return ( <> {isLoggedIn?(

{user.name}

{user.email}

Player profile

Date of Birth 29 April 1993
Nationality Country name
Club Debut January 21, 2017

Career Information

Macthes 12 matches
Runs 320 runs
Wickets 0 wickets
Role Wicketkeeper batsman
Batting Style Right-handed
Bowling Style Right-arm medium
) :null} ) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ auth: state.auth }); export default connect(mapStateToProps,null) (PlayerProfile);
